description:
Ruki Mukami starts feeling impatient when Kou and Azusa both confirm they don’t have any signs of the awakening. That night, Yui Komori trips on the school stairs due to lack of blood, but is saved by Yuma.  On their way to the nurse’s office, they run into Shu Sakamaki. Irritated by Shu’s attitude, Yuma suddenly feeds on Yui in front of Shu...
Source: crunchyroll
